00010 /*=====================================================================
00011  *                 PLEASE GO READ THE DOCUMENTATION!
00012  *         ------------------------------------------------
00013  *               $tarball_directory/doc/doxygen-doc/
00014  *                                or                            
00015  *           http://www.open-mpi.org/projects/hwloc/doc/
00016  *=====================================================================
00017  *
00018  * FAIR WARNING: Do NOT expect to be able to figure out all the
00019  * subtleties of hwloc by simply reading function prototypes and
00020  * constant descrptions here in this file.
00021  *
00022  * Hwloc has wonderful documentation in both PDF and HTML formats for
00023  * your reading pleasure.  The formal documentation explains a LOT of
00024  * hwloc-specific concepts, provides definitions, and discusses the
00025  * "big picture" for many of the things that you'll find here in this
00026  * header file.
00027  *
00028  * The PDF/HTML documentation was generated via Doxygen; much of what
00029  * you'll see in there is also here in this file.  BUT THERE IS A LOT
00030  * THAT IS IN THE PDF/HTML THAT IS ***NOT*** IN hwloc.h!
00031  *
00032  * There are entire paragraph-length descriptions, discussions, and
00033  * pretty prictures to explain subtle corner cases, provide concrete
00034  * examples, etc.
00035  *
00036  * Please, go read the documentation.  :-)
00037  *
00038  *=====================================================================*/

00319 struct hwloc_obj_memory_s {
00320   hwloc_uint64_t total_memory; 
00321   hwloc_uint64_t local_memory; 
00323   unsigned page_types_len; 
00329   struct hwloc_obj_memory_page_type_s {
00330     hwloc_uint64_t size;        
00331     hwloc_uint64_t count;       
00332   } * page_types;
00333 };

00339 struct hwloc_obj {
00340   /* physical information */
00341   hwloc_obj_type_t type;                
00342   unsigned os_index;                    
00343   char *name;                           
00345   struct hwloc_obj_memory_s memory;     
00347   union hwloc_obj_attr_u *attr;         
00350   /* global position */
00351   unsigned depth;                       
00356   unsigned logical_index;               
00358   signed os_level;                      
00360   /* cousins are all objects of the same type (and depth) across the entire topology */
00361   struct hwloc_obj *next_cousin;        
00362   struct hwloc_obj *prev_cousin;        
00364   /* children of the same parent are siblings, even if they may have different type and depth */
00365   struct hwloc_obj *parent;             
00366   unsigned sibling_rank;                
00367   struct hwloc_obj *next_sibling;       
00368   struct hwloc_obj *prev_sibling;       
00370   /* children array below this object */
00371   unsigned arity;                       
00372   struct hwloc_obj **children;          
00373   struct hwloc_obj *first_child;        
00374   struct hwloc_obj *last_child;         
00376   /* misc */
00377   void *userdata;                       
00379   /* cpusets and nodesets */
00380   hwloc_cpuset_t cpuset;                
00393   hwloc_cpuset_t complete_cpuset;       
00404   hwloc_cpuset_t online_cpuset;         
00412   hwloc_cpuset_t allowed_cpuset;        
00423   hwloc_nodeset_t nodeset;              
00440   hwloc_nodeset_t complete_nodeset;     
00454   hwloc_nodeset_t allowed_nodeset;      
00467   struct hwloc_distances_s **distances; 
00468   unsigned distances_count;
00469 
00470   struct hwloc_obj_info_s *infos;       
00471   unsigned infos_count;                 
00473   int symmetric_subtree;                
00476 };
00480 typedef struct hwloc_obj * hwloc_obj_t;
00481 
00483 union hwloc_obj_attr_u {
00485   struct hwloc_cache_attr_s {
00486     hwloc_uint64_t size;                          
00487     unsigned depth;                       
00488     unsigned linesize;                    
00489     int associativity;                    
00491     hwloc_obj_cache_type_t type;          
00492   } cache;
00494   struct hwloc_group_attr_s {
00495     unsigned depth;                       
00496   } group;
00498   struct hwloc_pcidev_attr_s {
00499     unsigned short domain;
00500     unsigned char bus, dev, func;
00501     unsigned short class_id;
00502     unsigned short vendor_id, device_id, subvendor_id, subdevice_id;
00503     unsigned char revision;
00504     float linkspeed; /* in GB/s */
00505   } pcidev;
00507   struct hwloc_bridge_attr_s {
00508     union {
00509       struct hwloc_pcidev_attr_s pci;
00510     } upstream;
00511     hwloc_obj_bridge_type_t upstream_type;
00512     union {
00513       struct {
00514         unsigned short domain;
00515         unsigned char secondary_bus, subordinate_bus;
00516       } pci;
00517     } downstream;
00518     hwloc_obj_bridge_type_t downstream_type;
00519     unsigned depth;
00520   } bridge;
00522   struct hwloc_osdev_attr_s {
00523     hwloc_obj_osdev_type_t type;
00524   } osdev;
00525 };
00526 
00541 struct hwloc_distances_s {
00542   unsigned relative_depth;      
00544   unsigned nbobjs;              
00549   float *latency;               
00554   float latency_max;            
00555   float latency_base;           
00559 };

00564   char *value;  
00565 };

01107 enum hwloc_get_type_depth_e {
01108     HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN = -1,    
01109     HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE = -2,   
01110     HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_BRIDGE = -3,     
01111     HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_PCI_DEVICE = -4, 
01112     HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_OS_DEVICE = -5   
01113 };
01114 
01119  hwloc_obj_type_t hwloc_get_depth_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth) ;
01120 
01123  unsigned hwloc_get_nbobjs_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth) ;
01124 
01130 static inline int
01131 hwloc_get_nbobjs_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type) ;
01132 static inline int
01133 hwloc_get_nbobjs_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
01134 {
01135         int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
01136         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
01137                 return 0;
01138         if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
01139                 return -1; /* FIXME: agregate nbobjs from different levels? */
01140         return hwloc_get_nbobjs_by_depth(topology, depth);
01141 }

01150  int hwloc_topology_is_thissystem(hwloc_topology_t  restrict topology) ;
01151 
01166  hwloc_obj_t hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth, unsigned idx) ;
01167 
01174 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01175 hwloc_get_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type, unsigned idx) ;
01176 static inline hwloc_obj_t
01177 hwloc_get_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type, unsigned idx)
01178 {
01179   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
01180   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
01181     return NULL;
01182   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
01183     return NULL;
01184   return hwloc_get_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, idx);
01185 }

01270 static inline const char *
01271 hwloc_obj_get_info_by_name(hwloc_obj_t obj, const char *name) ;
01272 static inline const char *
01273 hwloc_obj_get_info_by_name(hwloc_obj_t obj, const char *name)
01274 {
01275   unsigned i;
01276   for(i=0; i<obj->infos_count; i++)
01277     if (!strcmp(obj->infos[i].name, name))
01278       return obj->infos[i].value;
01279   return NULL;
01280 }
